channel.title: Germany on today is tomorrow's past
channel.description: Recent content in Germany on today is tomorrow's past

item.title: WFH Day 414
item.description: WFH Day 414 Unbelievable, but it’s already May of 2021! Time flies like crazy, and we are in month 15 of the pandemic. It looks like the US is speeding up things a lot, and people get vaccinated in large quantities. I got my vaccine three weeks ago. This upcoming Thursday, I’ll receive my 2nd shot, and then I should be fully vaccinated two weeks later. The situation is not so great in Germany.
